sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Y a-t-il un supermarché à proximité ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Is there a supermarket nearby?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cela correspond à nos exigences.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This meets our requirements.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons améliorer les conditions de vie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We need to improve living conditions.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait des recherches sur l'histoire de la Chine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is researching Chinese history.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le succès demande des efforts.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Success requires effort.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ duì kēxué hěn gǎn xìngqù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis très intéressé par la science.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I am very interested in science.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez couvrir la casserole.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please put the lid on the pot.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez remettre vos copies d'examen.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please hand in your test papers.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quel est le modèle de ce téléphone ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What model is this phone?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il prévoit d'immigrer au Canada.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He plans to immigrate to Canada.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez lui transmettre ce message.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please pass on this message to him.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Aujourd'hui, elle est particulièrement heureuse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Today she is especially happy.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous prenons le TGV pour aller à Shanghai.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We take the high-speed train to Shanghai.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他以高价卖出了那幅画。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yǐ gāojià màichū le nà fú huà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a vendu ce tableau à un prix élevé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He sold that painting at a high price.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'histoire a atteint son point culminant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The story reached its climax.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ duì yīnyuè hěn gǎn xìngqù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis très intéressé par la musique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I am very interested in music.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a des qualités morales élevées.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has noble character.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bāng wǒ fùyìn zhè fèn wénjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez m'aider à photocopier ce document.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please help me photocopy this document.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen gòng huā le yībǎi kuài qián.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous avons dépensé cent yuans au total.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We spent a total of one hundred yuan.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这两个房间被一堵墙隔开。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè liǎng gè fángjiān bèi yī dǔ qiáng gékāi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ces deux pièces sont séparées par un mur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: These two rooms are separated by a wall.
